<nowiki>[[File:App-dev-tablet-GoMobile.png]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu runs in a variety of devices and form factors. In these pages you will find information about Ubuntu for phones, tablets and mobile devices, and how to contribute to the platform.

/!\ Ubuntu Touch is no longer maintained as a core product by Canonical. However, the <nowiki>[[https://ubports.com/|Ubports]]</nowiki> community are continuing development.
